document.full_text: the boston red sox notched their sixth win in a row over arch rivals new york on wednesday, veteran knuckleballer tim wakefield picking up the win after boston's bats hammered the yankees in an 11-6 victory.
document.title: wakefield gets win as red sox blast yankees
lines_and_colors: the boston red sox notched their sixth win in a row over arch rivals new york on wednesday, veteran knuckleballer tim wakefield picking up the win after boston's bats hammered the yankees in an 11-6 victory.
